header.title: Welcome to SKOS Plugin for Forrest

section.title: Apache Forrest - SKOS Plugin
section.p: Rendering SKOS, a set of specifications to support the representation of thesauri, classification schemes, taxonomies, etc.

section.title: Samples
section.note: This plugin is in an early development stage.
section.p: This section includes samples that have been made available so far to show the existing functionality of the plugin.

section.title: Glossary
section.p: This sample generates a glossary from a collection of skos:Concepts written in RDF/XML format.
section.note: We plan to provide a wider support for the format in the near future.
section.p: The location of the glossary is specified in the locationmap with the hint skos.glossary. This defaults to a file called glossary.xml in src/documentation/content/xdocs/ relative to the plugin root. To place your glossary in a different location, simply add a matcher like that shown below in your project locationmap file.
To retrieve the SKOS source file in its raw form, request the file glossary/source.xml.
To retrieve the project details page request the file glossary.[FORMAT].
